    InterceptionFactory<T>
    InterceptionFactory.ignoreFinalMethods()
    Instructs the container to ignore all non-static, final methods with public, protected or default visibility declared by any class in the type hierarchy of the intercepted instance during invocation of createInterceptedInstance(Object).
